item.title: Open Search
item.description: Choose "Search" from the workbench Help menu. Help search page should open in the search view.

item.title: Perform Search
item.description: Type a query "open project" (without quotes), click "Go".

item.title: Select Result
item.description: Choose a result. The document should open with occurrences of the words "open" and "project" highlighted.

item.title: Toggle Highlighting
item.description: Click the "Highlight search items" button in the help view toolbar to toggle highlighting off. Ensure that "open" and "project" are no longer highlighted. Toggle it on and off again and ensure highlighting toggle appropriately.

item.title: Default Highlighting
item.description: With highlighing turned off, click the "Search" link to return to the search results and select one. Ensure that highlighting is now turned off by default.
